title: Discount - change fixed discounts on POS
text: Log into POS with a sales assistant number with administrator rights. Click DdD Admin button Next choose advanced configuration on the left
description:
1. Log into POS with a sales assistant number with administrator rights. 

  

  1. Click DdD Admin button  


  1.  

    Next choose advanced configuration on the left

title: Discount buttons – change
text: The client wants the discount buttons on the POS to be changed permanently to give a higher/lower discount. Log into DdD Admint through Support Tools (or through the client's POS) Choose Store and machine and press Change this machine only Choose Adv. Configuration Scroll down to FixedPercentage1 or 2 and change the percentage. Scroll down to the bottom and click Save, then click Close Reload POS to implement the new percentages.
description:
The client wants the discount buttons on the POS to be changed permanently to give a higher/lower discount. 

  

 

  

  1. Log into DdD Admint through Support Tools (or through the client's POS) 

  

 

  

  1. Choose Store and machine and press Change this machine only 

  

 

  

  1. Choose Adv. Configuration 

  

 

  

  1. Scroll down to FixedPercentage1 or 2 and change the percentage. 

  

 

  

  1. Scroll down to the bottom and click Save, then click Close 

  

 

  

  1. Reload POS to implement the new percentages.

title: Discount codes – change on POS (German PCs)
text: The client wants to change the discount codes. Log in to the customer'S POS. Open Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio Open Database / POS / System Tables and right-click on dbo.DiscountCodes and Edit Top 200 Rows Try to delete all. If some are used, delete those that can be deleted. 17 and 99 usually have to be renamed to nicht benutzen on German machines, and some of the others can remain. New Query Insert the code between ******* ********* use [POS] if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 1) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'1','Reduzierung norm.') else update discountcodes set name = 'Reduzierung norm.' where identifier = 1 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 2) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'2','Aktionsrabatt') else update discountcodes set name = 'Aktionsrabatt' where identifier = 2 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 3) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'3','2. Wahl') else update discountcodes set name = '2. Wahl' where identifier = 3 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 4) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'4','Nachbarschaftsrabatt') else update discountcodes set name = 'Nachbarschaftsrabatt' where identifier = 4 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 5) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'5','Glamour Shopping Week') else update discountcodes set name = 'Glamour Shopping Week' where identifier = 5 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 6) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'6','Sonstiges') else update discountcodes set name = 'Sonstiges' where identifier = 6 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 7) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'7','Personalkauf') else update discountcodes set name = 'Personalkauf' where identifier = 7 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 8) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'8','Treuekarte') else update discountcodes set name = 'Treuekarte' where identifier = 8 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 9) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'9','Black weekend') else update discountcodes set name = 'Black weekend' where identifier = 9 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 10) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'10','Family & Friends') else update discountcodes set name = 'Family & Friends' where identifier = 10 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 11) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'11','Directmailing') else update discountcodes set name = 'Directmailing' where identifier = 11 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 12) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'12','Extrarabatt auf Sale') else update discountcodes set name = 'Extrarabatt auf Sale' where identifier = 12 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 17) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'17','Loyalty Bonus') else update discountcodes set name = 'Loyalty Bonus' where identifier = 17 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 22) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'22','Kundenreklamation') else update discountcodes set name = 'Kundenreklamation' where identifier = 22 update configs set paramValue=1 where param ='DiscountCodeLimit' ******* Click Execute Click no
description:
The client wants to change the discount codes. 

  

 

  

  1. Log in to the customer'S POS. Open Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio 

  

  1. Open Database / POS / System Tables and right-click on dbo.DiscountCodes and Edit Top 200 Rows 

  

  1. Try to delete all. If some are used, delete those that can be deleted. 17 and 99 usually have to be renamed to nicht benutzen on German machines, and some of the others can remain. 

  

 

  

  1. New Query 

  

  1. Insert the code between ******* 

  

********* 

  

use [POS] 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 1) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'1','Reduzierung norm.') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Reduzierung norm.' where identifier = 1 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 2) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'2','Aktionsrabatt') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Aktionsrabatt' where identifier = 2 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 3) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'3','2. Wahl') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = '2. Wahl' where identifier = 3 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 4) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'4','Nachbarschaftsrabatt') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Nachbarschaftsrabatt' where identifier = 4 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 5) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'5','Glamour Shopping Week') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Glamour Shopping Week' where identifier = 5 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 6) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'6','Sonstiges') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Sonstiges' where identifier = 6 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 7) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'7','Personalkauf') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Personalkauf' where identifier = 7 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 8) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'8','Treuekarte') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Treuekarte' where identifier = 8 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 9) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'9','Black weekend') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Black weekend' where identifier = 9 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 10) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'10','Family & Friends') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Family & Friends' where identifier = 10 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 11) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'11','Directmailing') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Directmailing' where identifier = 11 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 12) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'12','Extrarabatt auf Sale') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Extrarabatt auf Sale' where identifier = 12 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 17) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'17','Loyalty Bonus') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Loyalty Bonus' where identifier = 17 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 22) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'22','Kundenreklamation') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Kundenreklamation' where identifier = 22 

  

update configs set paramValue=1 where param ='DiscountCodeLimit' 

  

  

******* 

  

  1. Click Execute 

  

 

  

  1. Click no

title: Discount reasons – window doesn't show up on total discount
text: If the cusotmer wants a total discount on the entire amount and the discount reason window doesn't open. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Solution 1: Log into POS Choose store -> Choose machine -> Change this machine only Set TotalDiscountReason to 1 Scroll down to bottom and click Save and Close Reload POS This is the missing window: Solution 2: Open Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio and log into the database Database -> POS Click New Query Paste the below into the window: update configs set paramValue=99 where param ='DiscountCodeLimit' This assures that the discount reasons only show up if a discount of 100% is given Click Execute Click No when this window appears Afterwards, paste the following in to the window bar: update configs set paramValue=01 where param ='DiscountCodeLimit' This assures that any discount percentage shows the discount reason window Click Execute
description:
If the cusotmer wants a total discount on the entire amount and the discount reason window doesn't open. 

  

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 

  

Solution 1: 

  

  1. Log into POS 

  1.  

  1. Choose store -> Choose machine -> Change this machine only 

  

 

  

  1.  

  

  1.  

Set TotalDiscountReason to 1 

  

  1. Scroll down to bottom and click Save and Close 

 

  

  1. Reload POS 

  

This is the missing window:  

 

  

  

Solution 2: 

  

  1. Open Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio and log into the database 

  

  1. Database -> POS 

  

  1. Click New Query 

  

  1. Paste the below into the window: 

  

update configs set paramValue=99 where param ='DiscountCodeLimit' 

  

  1. This assures that the discount reasons only show up if a discount of 100% is given 

  

Click Execute 

  

 

Click No when this window appears

   


Afterwards, paste the following in to the window bar:

update configs set paramValue=01 where param ='DiscountCodeLimit'
 

  1. This assures that any discount percentage shows the discount reason window


Click Execute

title: Discountreasons_Message
text: use [POS] if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 1) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'1','Misfarvning') else update discountcodes set name = 'Misfarvning' where identifier = 1 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 2) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'2','Fejl på vare') else update discountcodes set name = 'Fejl på vare' where identifier = 2 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 3) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'3','Salg til personale') else update discountcodes set name = 'Salg til personale' where identifier = 3 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 4) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'4','Salg til kollega') else update discountcodes set name = 'Salg til kollega' where identifier = 4 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 5) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'5','Udsalg') else update discountcodes set name = 'Udsalg' where identifier = 5 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 6) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'6','Studierabat') else update discountcodes set name = 'Studierabat' where identifier = 6 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 7) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'7','Message Rabatkort') else update discountcodes set name = 'Message Rabatkort' where identifier = 7 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 8) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'8','Kundeklub Voucher') else update discountcodes set name = 'Kundeklub Voucher' where identifier = 8 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 17) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'17','Loyalty Bonus') else update discountcodes set name = 'Loyalty Bonus' where identifier = 17 update configs set paramValue=1 where param ='DiscountCodeLimit'
description:
use [POS] 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 1) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'1','Misfarvning') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Misfarvning' where identifier = 1 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 2) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'2','Fejl på vare') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Fejl på vare' where identifier = 2 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 3) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'3','Salg til personale') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Salg til personale' where identifier = 3 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 4) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'4','Salg til kollega') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Salg til kollega' where identifier = 4 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 5) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'5','Udsalg') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Udsalg' where identifier = 5 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 6) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'6','Studierabat') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Studierabat' where identifier = 6 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 7) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'7','Message Rabatkort') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Message Rabatkort' where identifier = 7 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 8) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'8','Kundeklub Voucher') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Kundeklub Voucher' where identifier = 8 

  

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 17) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'17','Loyalty Bonus') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Loyalty Bonus' where identifier = 17 

  

update configs set paramValue=1 where param ='DiscountCodeLimit'

title: Discount Codes - CBR
text: If the Discount codes on CBR POS are either in Danish or don't exist, use the following query to create them in the SQL database. New Query under POS: if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 1) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'1',' Reduzierung norm.') else update discountcodes set name = ' Reduzierung norm.' where identifier = 1 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 2) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'2','Aktionsrabatt') else update discountcodes set name = 'Aktionsrabatt' where identifier = 2 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 3) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'3',' Warenmangel ') else update discountcodes set name = ' Warenmangel ' where identifier = 3 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 4) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'4','VIP Shopping') else update discountcodes set name = 'VIP Shopping' where identifier = 4 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 5) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'5',' Glamour Shopping Week ') else update discountcodes set name = ' Glamour Shopping Week ' where identifier = 5 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 6) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'6',' Nachbarschaftsrabatt ') else update discountcodes set name = ' Nachbarschaftsrabatt ' where identifier = 6 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 7) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'7',' Personalrabatt') else update discountcodes set name = ' Personalrabatt' where identifier = 7 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 8) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'8',' Sonstiges') else update discountcodes set name = ' Sonstiges' where identifier = 8
description:
If the Discount codes on CBR POS are either in Danish or don't exist, use the following query to create them in the SQL database.


New Query under POS:


if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 1)

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'1',' Reduzierung norm.')

else

   update discountcodes set name = ' Reduzierung norm.' where identifier = 1

 

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 2)

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'2','Aktionsrabatt')

else

   update discountcodes set name = 'Aktionsrabatt' where identifier = 2

 

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 3)

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'3',' Warenmangel ')

else

   update discountcodes set name = ' Warenmangel ' where identifier = 3

 

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 4)

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'4','VIP Shopping')

else

   update discountcodes set name = 'VIP Shopping' where identifier = 4

 

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 5)

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'5',' Glamour Shopping Week ')

else

   update discountcodes set name = ' Glamour Shopping Week ' where identifier = 5

 

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 6)

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'6',' Nachbarschaftsrabatt ')

else

   update discountcodes set name = ' Nachbarschaftsrabatt ' where identifier = 6

 

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 7)

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'7',' Personalrabatt')

else

   update discountcodes set name = ' Personalrabatt' where identifier = 7

 

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 8)

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'8',' Sonstiges')

else

   update discountcodes set name = ' Sonstiges' where identifier = 8

title: Discount Reasons CBR
text: Update discount reasons for CBR POS 1. Shutdown POS Password 70223010 2. Open Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio 3. Click Connect​ ​ ​First you should check what the Discount Codes are called: ​ 4. Find dbo.DiscountCodes 5. Right-click and choose Edit Top 200 Rows (standard is set to 200 Rows) 6. Click New Query 7. Copy and paste the below (inside the lines) into the window use [POS] if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 1) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'1','Reduzierung norm.') else update discountcodes set name = 'Reduzierung norm.' where identifier = 1 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 2) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'2','Aktionsrabatt') else update discountcodes set name = 'Aktionsrabatt' where identifier = 2 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 3) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'3','Warenmangel') else update discountcodes set name = 'Warenmangel' where identifier = 3 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 4) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'4','VIP Shopping') else update discountcodes set name = 'VIP Shopping' where identifier = 4 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 5) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'5','Glamour Shopping Week') else update discountcodes set name = 'Glamour Shopping Week' where identifier = 5 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 6) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'6','Nachbarshaftsrabatt') else update discountcodes set name = 'Nachbarschaftsrabatt' where identifier = 6 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 7) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'7','Personalrabatt') else update discountcodes set name = 'Personalrabatt' where identifier = 7 if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 8) insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'8','Sonstiges') else update discountcodes set name = 'Sonstiges' where identifier = 8 8. Click Execute The message should look like this. 9. Reopen dbo.DiscountCodes (if it is still open, close it down, then reopen it) 10. If there are any codes above 8, highlight and delete them. 11. Restart the POS.
description:
Update discount reasons for CBR POS

 

1. Shutdown POS

Password 70223010

2. Open Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio


3. Click Connect​
​
​First you should check what the Discount Codes are called:
​

4. Find dbo.DiscountCodes

 

5. Right-click and choose Edit Top 200 Rows (standard is set to 200 Rows)

 

6. Click New Query


7. Copy and paste the below (inside the lines) into the window 

 

 

use [POS] 

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 1) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'1','Reduzierung norm.') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Reduzierung norm.' where identifier = 1 

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 2) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'2','Aktionsrabatt') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Aktionsrabatt' where identifier = 2 

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 3) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'3','Warenmangel') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Warenmangel' where identifier = 3 

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 4) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'4','VIP Shopping') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'VIP Shopping' where identifier = 4 

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 5) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'5','Glamour Shopping Week') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Glamour Shopping Week' where identifier = 5 

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 6) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'6','Nachbarshaftsrabatt') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Nachbarschaftsrabatt' where identifier = 6 

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 7) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'7','Personalrabatt') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Personalrabatt' where identifier = 7 

if not exists (select * from discountcodes where identifier = 8) 

   insert into discountcodes values(newid(),'8','Sonstiges') 

else 

   update discountcodes set name = 'Sonstiges' where identifier = 8

 

 

8. Click Execute

The message should look like this.

9. Reopen dbo.DiscountCodes (if it is still open, close it down, then reopen it)

10. If there are any codes above 8, highlight and delete them.

11. Restart the POS.
